review: ok, I bought this for my living room and Roku for all our bedrooms.... SO far I have had to return this because after watching anything for just a few minutes it freezes up and says there is no internet connection. When there clearly is internet connection... Then I have to get up and reset it by unplugging it and then it works again for a few minutes.. So they took it back and sent me a new one right away.... NEW one does the same thing right from the start only once I reset it, it at least lasts a few hours before it needs to be reset... I do not recommend this.. also, everything on Amazon prime it mixed up, free movies and shows with ones you have to pay for.. I don't like that... you find a show and get all excited that they have it and then you see they want 1.99 and Up for it..... that sucks... I Love Our Roku I have 3 of them... and I have never had to reset any of them... I have (2) Roku 2 and (1) Roku 1 all work great.
